Posts.Content: Hi ladies  Had my first FEC on friday and apart from a bad night of almost sickness that night and mild nausea here and there i feel normal (sorry forgot the hot cheeks - side affect of one of the drugs...) it worries me that im setting myself up for a fall next time  reading all the experiences is seems very likely - how do i keep upbeat to face the August challenge?  Hugs to you all on this challenging journey  FF x
Posts.Title: Am i feeling too normal?

Posts.Content: Thanks ladies, makes me feel a bit more confident for the next few weeks anyway but yes having T - look forward to that then..l! FF x
Posts.Title: Am i feeling too normal?
